entries.original: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/2294 moves the login server from Python to Rust, which should help with both https://github.com/openai/codex/issues/2000 and https://github.com/openai/codex/issues/2044.
entries.translated: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/2294 로그인 서버를 Python에서 Rust로 이동하여 https://github.com/openai/codex/issues/2000 및 https://github.com/openai/codex/issues/2044 문제를 해결할 수 있습니다.

entries.original: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/2029 adds support for markdown streaming
https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/2270 improves the UI treatment of diffs so they are more readable when using a light background
entries.translated: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/2270 밝은 배경을 사용할 때 차이를 더 읽기 쉽게 UI 처리를 개선

entries.original: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/2113 `ctrl-z` can be used to suspend the TUI
entries.translated: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/2113 `ctrl-z`를 사용하여 TUI를 일시 중지할 수 있습니다.
